thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Cassandra Oil, ‍Reaktor ApS To Amend Previously Published Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cassandra Oil, ‍Reaktor ApS To Amend Previously Published Agreement
text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - Cassandra Oil Ab:
* ‍REAKTOR APS AND CASSANDRA OIL AB HAVE TODAY AGREED TO AMEND AGREEMENT PREVIOUSLY PUBLISHED ON 17THOF NOVEMBER 2017​
* ‍REAKTOR APS HAS BEEN OFFERED AN ALTERNATIVE FUNDING SOLUTION, BY AN ENVIRONMENTAL INVESTMENT FUND​
* ‍ALTERNATIVE FUNDING IN FORM OF A LOAN WHICH WOULD BE FAVOURABLE IN CONTRAST TO EQUITY INJECTION INTO JOINT VENTURE COMPANY
* ‍NEW SOLUTION MENTIONED ABOVE ALLOWS CASSANDRA AND REAKTOR APS TO KEEP ALL EQUITY IN JV​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
